name: df-tanh
body: |- wceq(ctanh, cmpt(s0, cima(ccnv(ccosh), cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), co(cfv(ctan, co(ci, cmul, cv(s0))), cdiv, ci)))
comment: Define the hyperbolic tangent function (tanh). We define it this way for ~ cmpt , which requires the form ` ( x e. A |-> B ) ` . (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 10-May-2015.)
